PageTitle: display mpls l2vc track admin-vc interface
FuncDef: The display mpls l2vc track admin-vc interface command displays information about service PWs bound to an mPW.
CLIs: display mpls l2vc track admin-vc interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ upe ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about service PWs bound to a specified mPW.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vc track admin-vc interface loopback 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about the service PWs or MS-PWs bound to an mPW, run the display mpls l2vc track admin-vc interface command. The displayed information facilitates user configuration and management.
Precautions
Currently, only service PWs can be bound to an mPW. Therefore, the display mpls l2vc track admin-vc command output contains only information about service PWs.
